Package controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginController
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
The Login Controller contains the business logic regarding the login process

    (package private) void processLoginRequest​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
    Method is called when the LoginListener of the LoginFrame is activated(Login-Button) -fetches the User with the given username from the database -compares the password - sets LoginFrame to not visible - sets currentUser to fetched User - triggers the actionListener which is set by the MainController

    Processes a registration request and verifies if all the constraints are met, adds the user to the database if so.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginController

      public LoginController()

  • Method Details

    • processLoginRequest

      void processLoginRequest​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Method is called when the LoginListener of the LoginFrame is activated(Login-Button) -fetches the User with the given username from the database -compares the password - sets LoginFrame to not visible - sets currentUser to fetched User - triggers the actionListener which is set by the MainController
      Parameters:
      username - the username submitted in the LoginFrame
      password - the password submitted in the LoginFrame

    • processRegistrationRequest

      public void processRegistrationRequest​(view.events.UserEvent e)
      Processes a registration request and verifies if all the constraints are met, adds the user to the database if so. Schows a message if not.
      Parameters:
      e - the event containing all the information required for the registration

    • initializeLoginFrame

      void initializeLoginFrame()
      Initializes LoginFrame (size, etc.)
